=======
>>>>>>> master You can see the touristic places in Istanbul according to their categories. You can also discover the dishes that should be eaten in Istanbul. You can find sightseeing places on the map, be directed to Google Maps to get directions and even add your special locations such as your hotel and your airport to the map. You can get information about tha place you are interested in. Just click on the google icon for this. You can collect a place you like or interest in a separate list by clicking the heart icon. So you can reach them faster. You can get suggestions for events according to the weather of Istanbul.
Next Let\'s Start
Hello blank fragment
<<<<<<< HEAD
Good morning. It is sunny today. How about having a nice Turkish breakfast on the breakfast street in Beşiktaş? Are you ready to enjoy the Bosphorus by inhaling the clean smell of the Bosphorus? You can walk the Ortaköy-Kuruçeşme-Arnavutköy-Bebek-Rumeli Fortress line in 1 hour. Do you want to eat fish and bread in Eminönü? After eating baked potatoes in Ortaköy, it might be a good idea to have waffles in Bebek. Have you ever had boza before? How about you give it a try? It can be a good idea to drink boza in Vefa. Is not it nice weather to go to the islands and ride a bike? Would not you like to enjoy the Istanbul Bosphorus with a fun ferry tour? Do not forget to buy simit and throw it to the seagulls before you get on the ferry. You are not going to stay at home because it is evening? How about watching the magnificent lights of Istanbul from a high hill and enjoying the view? For example, Çamlıca or Pierre Loti Hill is a very nice place for this. Is not it the time to have some fun? Europes most beautiful night clubs are waiting for you outside. There is nothing like going to Piyer Loti by the cable car and watching the view of the old Istanbul… You can have your afternoon tea or evening coffee in the outdoor cafes built at the top. It is a great place to take photos, especially at sunset. Moda beach is ideal for leisure time. In sunny weather you can buy a ice cream and walk along the beach, have a coffee or take a bike tour along the beach. If you want to start your day healthy, you can get out of bed a little early and go to Belgrade for morning exercise. If you want to listen to some music and chill out, it might be a very good idea to go to a concert of your favorite style. Get your ticket and enjoy the fun When the weather is sunny, take a walk from Karaköy. Photograph everything that could be an “Istanbul Classic” along the Galata bridge. When you are hungry, buy a Niğde Gazoz and simit or a delicious fish bread under the bridge… What more can you ask for! Here is another Istanbul classic for you… Getting lost in the streets of Kuzguncuk is free! Walk, take pictures, check out the houses, cute little shops. When you are hungry, be sure to buy something from the historical bakery. You can even climb the long stairs of Kuzguncuk and eat your cookie against the Bosphorus view.
======= >>>>>>> master
